abstract: Catholic Charities, one of the beneficiaries of the New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps single mother Ivonne Diaz pay her electric bill after she loses her job of 25 years with the Off-Track Betting Corporation.
lead_paragraph: When New York’s OTB shut down, Ivonne Diaz had worked there 24 years and 4 months, falling just short of the 25-year minimum required to collect a pension.
